text: Alfredo "Doca" de Almeida Rego (14 May 1905 - 30 July 1988)Doca himself told when and where he was born in an interview: Critica (RJ), #437, p.4, Apr 9, 1930 was a Brazilian football player. He played for Brazil national team.Alfredo Almeida Rego's profile at worldfootball.net == References == Category:1903 births Category:1988 deaths Category:Footballers from Rio Grande do Sul
title: Alfredo Almeida Rego
